website_summaries.verdict: It's a good pick for novices to smart lighting and those who want to dabble in the technology, but serious techies will find it lacking in advanced technology capabilities and reliability.
pros: An affordable and fun way to introduce yourself to smart lighting
Features multi-color hues and a built-in Bluetooth speaker
Can be controlled from a remote control or with almost any smartphone or tablet
cons: Not compatible with as many smart devices as other models we considered

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: Frankly, this device has no right to be as good as it is for the price point. The colors of the LED are bright and clear, the white setting is very bright, and the remote and presets work well. Best of all, the speaker on this is pretty good. Nothing too fancy, no deep bass or anything, but the sound is clear and it can get pretty loud. My favorite feature is the color-changing presets. It can cycle through colors quickly, slowly, or fade between colors. I've basically been running it for a week straight already, I don't know what fascinates so much but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: William Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Two Thumbs Up...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME. I Installed it in the shower and can now rock out with my phone while showering. The light is cool too....you can dim, and change colors with the little remote if you want to, or just use it as a normal light. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: ofd1234

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is wonderful. I'm using it outside on my deck in a covered light enclosure. The sound is as good as could be expected for the price. It's great for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: works great, but only one at a time.
customer_reviews.text: Work as described, easy to set up and use. You CAN NOT use the same phone or ipad, etc. to operate more than one. I'm sure it can be done if you know how to program an arduino device or want to hire someone to do that, but otherwise it just doesn't work for more than one - maybe unless you're on a whole house system? Haven't tried that yet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong after two years
customer_reviews.text: Even though the manufacturer now says not to install in a humid environment, when we bought it, there was no such warning. So in the shower it went. Two years later it still works like the day we screwed it in. I don't know whether the manufacturer is the same, whether the quality is the same - you know how these things go with no-name stuff (but tbh, name-brand stuff has failed on me just as much) -- but our purchase has exceeded our expectations by at least a year. Cannot recommend it enough. Our kids belt out their music at the top of their lungs and love this bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Kren

customer_reviews.title: Bought for our office waiting room and it has great sound. Works well with my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our office waiting room and it has great sound. Works well with my iPhone. The only thing I would note is it's a cool white and our other bulbs are warm white. You can change the colors. Very nice speaker and light. No charging!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect speaker and Light
customer_reviews.text: I really like this speaker and Light the light is 5000 Kelvin it's a beautiful white light but you can also change it to different colors the only downside about this is when you first start listening to music it's a 3 to 4 second wait before it kicks in but other than that 11 a lot more than my $40 one that I got at Lowe's that only works half the time I plan on buying more I'm not sure if you can link them together I'm going to try when I buy another
customer_reviews.author: Darkgodess

customer_reviews.title: I really like how this bulb comes with a remote and that ...
customer_reviews.text: For a product that has 2 functions, I am impressed with the execution! The light is bright and you can select different colors. I really like how this bulb comes with a remote and that you do not have to rely on a application to access the different features. In regards to the sound quality, it is good, especially for the price. Overall, excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: giving it 1 star...
customer_reviews.text: I love the speaker but after a month or use without dropping it or moving it all the time or anything like that it just stopped working all together for no reason it still syncs but no audio whatsoever :'(
customer_reviews.author: Jim darling

customer_reviews.title: Affordable option
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a cheaper alternative to one I found at a local store . Great for price but I will admit even though my other one has no color changing I like the other one better . Pros- changes colors - has remote - option for lights to flash with music - great price -easy to sync Cons- - big - no warranty - not as loud as others -CAN'T SYNC WITH EACH OTHER IF YOU WANT A AFFORADABLE CUTE LIGHT WITH MEDIUM SOUND AND DONT WWNT A WHOLE HOUSE SOUND THIS WILL WORK. WORKS GREAT FOR KIDS ROOMS.
customer_reviews.author: M&R

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun and Works Well
customer_reviews.text: The speaker/light is a really fun addition to our kitchen. It hooked right up to our Echo so we use it to stream our Amazon Prime music or radio stations to it. The number of color choices is good and you can vary the intensity of the light from dim to quite bright. The white is really bright and will help you find dropped contact lenses at night (don't ask). To use the synchronized light to music feature the volume has to be at a certain volume so if it doesn't work turn it up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Witek

customer_reviews.title: Either a genius idea or an instrument of torture.
customer_reviews.text: This was either the best idea or absolutely the worst. The light bulb can be either bright or dimmer, even in a socket that does not have dimmer features. The different colors is really cool and having a bluetooth speaker in a room that otherwise does not have surround sound is really neat, despite speaker not being the best quality. The kid is absolutely enthralled with this... that's where the problem comes in... Baby Shark song being blasted over and over at top volume.... torture. So far pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISING SOUND!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 (thinking I'd give one to my mom if the quality was good enough), but she bought 2 after hearing mine. These little speakers are exactly what I needed as I kept misplacing my small blue-tooth speaker. Now I have one installed in my bathroom to listen to as I get ready in the morning and one in my basement. It's absolutely perfect and the price couldn't be better. It will probably end up as gifts to friends and family. GET IT..you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: rj

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy it very much will recommend
customer_reviews.text: Well I gave up three stars for the remote control because I had issues with it what the company replaced it at no cost so kudos to them so far it's still works if you're expecting a great Bluetooth speaker seriously don't expect that plus you shouldn't expect it works perfectly fine I hit my music I can even use it to talk on the phone I really like it I'm going to purchase a few more cuz I want to put them sporadically throughout my house because they fit in my high hats ceiling lights I have recommended them to already a whole bunch of my friends
customer_reviews.author: sean herrera

customer_reviews.title: Bit large, but great for listening to music in large bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Bulb size is large so it doesn’t fit any of my household lamps ( tempted to get the newer, smaller version.) That being said, I use it in one of the hanging pendants over the tub (tulip shaped flared shade) and it works great. No it’s not amazing sound quality but works well enough for listening in the the bathroom. The tub is completely separated from shower area so no issues with moisture. LED light is great for creating a low light, more relaxing ambiance when soaking in tub. No issues connecting to Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: MsTHS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!! Super easy to install and quick to use!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS ITEM!!! So simple to install and use! I love it so much that i bought it 3 times!!! I got one for myself, my father in law, and my brother for his room!! We jam to music from our phone, listen to movies from our ipad, and rock out in the garage!! This is a great price too!! I saw some at target for much more...so glad that i got it on amazon from here. It's super cool...everyone has asked me where i got this and told everyone i got on here!! I don't really write reviews but i HAD to for this item....you won't regret it!! Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: We use these all the time
customer_reviews.text: When I got these I purchased two of them. I installed them both on my patio. Simply unscrew the old light bulb and screw in the new bulb. Then the only remaining step is to turn on the lights and connect the Bluetooth. The Bluetooth connection went on without a hitch. While the sound isn't super they definitely do the trick for listening from the yard. To do stereo or more than one speaker you will need to be able to connect to two Bluetooth devices at once. if you can't do that from your device there are adaptors that can help with that.
customer_reviews.author: M Westcott

customer_reviews.title: ... sister who lives with me for Christmas it was fine until she tried to unscrew it from the light ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sister who lives with me for Christmas it was fine until she tried to unscrew it from the light socket to move it. We put it into a non permanent spot so we could see how it worked, then when she tried to unscrew it the part that screws in became unattached from the rest it was a let down and her present was ruined. We had to spend 20 min trying to get the part stuck in the socket out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent bulb when it works
customer_reviews.text: The remote control works pretty well and the sound is pretty good for the small speaker. The range of colors looks pretty good as well. The issue is with bulb turning on in the correct "state". 3 out 4 times when I turn the bulb on, the color defaults to yellow and nothing else works. The remote nor the bluetooth work. After I turn it off and on a few times, it finally turns on white. Then I can use the remote and bluetooth speaker. It worked well enough for Halloween, but if I wouldn't use as a normal light if you depended on the color/speaker.
customer_reviews.author: A Strick

customer_reviews.title: Dim lighting with a default of flouresent white, not warm. Sound quality acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: I like how the default is white so every time you turn it on, it is a functional color. HOWEVER I hate cool lighting. I wish the "white" was warm and not flouresent. You can use orange for warmth but the rest of the color modes are a step above a night light so good luck trying to read a book or something. The bass is horrible so don't pump your edm or anything lol but overall I'm happy with it's functionality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: V.C.

customer_reviews.title: BEST. AMAZON. PURCHASE. EVER. Endless fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best $17 I have ever spent on Amazon! We got this to use on Halloween, we made a Halloween playlist on our Amazon Music account and played it while kids trick-or-treated at our house. Then, we started playing Rockwell’s one and only hit “Somebody’s Watching Me” or Spongebob’s “Krusty Krab Pizza” when our pizza delivery guys/girls walk up to the door (Rick Astley is played a lot, too). I currently have my Christmas playlist going all day and night...I have way too much fun with this thing. If we are ever having a themed day in my daycare, I’ll play certain songs as the kids are arriving in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: EmporiaHornGirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light bulb!! This is my 4th order for this light bulb. Amazing is the word for this light bulb.. no app needed.. just bluetooth like any other speaker.. just connect to phone and waalaa!! The only thing i will say that im disappointed is.. since this is my 4th time buying.... everytime I have gone to buy this.. it fets more and more expensive. (Maybe because its closer to Christmas, however just shows the greed which makes me not want to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Gloss

customer_reviews.title: Great product at such a low price!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love it so far. The speaker is pretty good considering it’s coming out of a light bulb. The light is very vibrant. The only negative thing I have to say about it is that only 4 colors are really nice, the rest are very light and just adds a tint. Honestly I only want it for white, blue and red so I doesn’t matter to me. Also you can choose if you want it to stay in the one color or change colors if you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Diandra

customer_reviews.title: Over all Great product
customer_reviews.text: This gadget is pretty cool, we have it in our bathroom so we can have music while getting ready in the morning. The only problem I have found is that it connects to the last device that was in the room from quite a distance. A little shocking when you walk in to do your business and your kids rap music starts blaring and the Disco lights start when you flip the light switch because they were the last connected and still within range 😂😂 It seems to hold up really well in a semi wet environment and we have had it for about 8 months I would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyAnn

customer_reviews.title: 1/3/19 to 6/17/19 R.I.P.
customer_reviews.text: 6 months of life from this thing? smh... nope I do not recommend buying this thing, I didn't even use it a whole lot because it was used as an overhead light when I play video games/listen to music. It worked while it lasted and I was happy with it, but for it to only last 6 months in a very healthy environment for electronics?? Will try and see if there is a warranty and possibly update my review from there to let anyone know!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Def worth it if you want 1 only per room
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just be aware that these are NOT syncable with multiple lights. That being said.. The sound quality was way better than I expected. The light is dimmable via remote and the colors all worked perfectly for me. The bulb is on the larger side but it should still fit in most high hat cans. Bluetooth connected right away no issue. It sure beats throwing up high hats AND ceiling speakers. I’d recommended 10/10. Only “downside” is the light takes about 2 seconds to kick on once you flip the switch on. But you can turn the light on and off via the remote so I guess technically you don’t even need a switch which is another plus.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tullio

customer_reviews.title: A fun buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! I purchased two for Christmas, and they work fantastic. The sound is clear, and the bluetooth range is good. There are plenty of color changing options. I will say, that the white light, isnt very bright, and almost has a faint blue hue. I did make a fun discovery. The instructions say you can only pair to one device, but I was able to pair both at once with my phone. My Galaxy S9 has an option for dual audio, when the bluetooth is on. Check you phone settings, and see if you have something similar, otherwise... just buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Just not ready for prime time.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is small, rather tinny. The color flashing isn't that important to me, but the lightbulb part of it is horrible. It's not good in a place where you actually need light. And the really bad thing is that you can only use one speaker at a time. So you get this weird mono speaker sound, even though the other three I bought were connected and paired to the computer, only one speaker can engage at a time. I think there's software out there to resolve that, and I tried a few that were recommended on tech sights, but nothing worked for me. I'm returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: We put this in the kitchen, where there were a lot of other recessed lights. This one is definitely not as bright... but that is not important to us. The beautiful sound fills the kitchen and makes working there a lot more fun!!! As other reviewers noted, you won’t get the deep bass as you would from a high end speaker, but I didn’t expect that -/ the sound is great!!! I bought a few more that are going to some other rooms in the house as well as to give to family members. Very fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Grateful

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect a BRIGHT light from this or a BOSE sounding speaker. It is great for a bathroom. If you are going to use this inside of a pot-light, it will be great as it uses that cavity for the sound and give a better sound. The light definitely is not bright enough to light a room. but can work in conjunction with others. But i would definitly recommend this ... Its a great quick BT speaker...
customer_reviews.author: Sarge812

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker terrible light
customer_reviews.text: Got today and installed it in the kitchen for the girlfriend and the light came on easy to connect to with my phone but the remote control doesn't work at all. So it's stuck in changing color mode which is really aggravating! But the speaker works surprisingly well. Update- they sent me a new remote and it's not working either! Probably something in the light itself. Good customer service though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Really cool light-bulb bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Really cool light-bulb bluetooth speaker! I use it for music and sound effects for my D&D, Dungeons and Dragons games. It is not bright enough to be the only bulb to play the game under but I use it in a lamp at my DM station. The speaker is plenty loud enough for my use. Yes it lacks bass but would you really expect it to have it? I wish that the flash with music mode had a choice to stay on one color instead of transitioning to colors over time. And that it was brighter in the color modes.
customer_reviews.author: JTR

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth speaker bulb.
customer_reviews.text: Remote control works as expected, all colors are bright and vibrant. Bluetooth connects easily and the speaker sounds good. Volume is plenty for a small room, but if you take your volume up over 3/4, you will hear significant distortion. This is a great product and a great value. No app is required to use this bulb. Just screw it in, connect and enjoy! Also, shipping was fast and on time and well protected.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Happy
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect Sonos or Bose quality here, so I'm pretty happy. So easy to set up. The sound is big enough to fill a large room. I don't even care about the light functionality, but that works well. For the price, this has been a good buy for us. We have one in our kitchen and one in the master bathroom. Only drawback is that I can only connect to two speakers at once. I'm glad I didn't buy several thinking I would put one in every room of the house; with the 2 speaker limit and range limitation, this wouldn't have worked. It would also be nice if I could connect this to my Google Home.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bulb works well. There isn't a lot of bass in the sound but that's to be expected at this price point. I have it installed in a fixture above the shower in a nine foot ceiling so I don't expect any problems with moisture. I have it connected to an Echo Dot and when I switch on the light it connects to the Dot in a couple of seconds and plays. Good bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Worked one day then quit
customer_reviews.text: Worked for one day. Sending back. Tried to contact texsens through their website to figure it out but their contact number is in China and my email wouldn't go through their contact page (it told me server not accepted). I'm super disappointed because it was fun for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Its a light / its a speaker
customer_reviews.text: Easy enuff a child could do it. The sound is decent, the lights are nice. I noticed that flash and fade are no different on the ones I put in two bathrooms. It would be nice if the bulbs could sync to connect two bulbs in one location for more sound. I would say they are okay, but Im thinking a regular bluetooth speaker that is waterproof woulda been better.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinions

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Gadget For The Price
customer_reviews.text: What a great little idea. It combines a 6 watt light (total output in white) which is conveniently your default when turning it on with a speaker and rgb 16 color light with egfects. The Bluetooth connects quickly and the speaker sounds good for its size. The speaker is great at close proximity but can be a good background for even a large room. There is very little distortion (depending on source) at max volume.
customer_reviews.author: Jim kline

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It works well, the bulb volume is great for the size, and everyone who has been over has ordered one based on mine. This light bulb is the best for the price and connects well to Bluetooth. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Muse

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase we've made in a while. This is the MOST awesomest mechanism. The sounds is clear, loud (as you want it) and just easy to use. Need to make sure you a lampshade large enough in circumference...but fits AND WORKS with any lamp/light socket. Even worked outside and was great for a cook out! Will definitely buy more for around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool I need to buy more and install them all over the house so no matter where I walk throughout the house they will always be connected to some sort of device and they will always be playing music. The colors are awesome but not SUPER bright, on the dimmer side but I’m not really bothered by it. Decent sound for a small little bulb speaker too!
customer_reviews.author: Erika GustafsonTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I was seriously shocked when I connected this light bulb to my smart phone. The sound that it emits is very impressive considering it is a light bulb. The multicolored lights work great and will even pulsate to music if you choose that setting. It was very easy to set up, just screw the light bulb in, choose the correct blue tooth device on your smart phone, and you are ready to listen to music and enjoy color during a relaxing bath, workout, party, or just for fun. I am very happy with this purchase. I hope it holds up well because it will be used quite often in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Byrdstowntn

customer_reviews.title: Product is not as advertised and has been returned...
customer_reviews.text: Returned the product. Did not function as advertised; as soon as power was removed (turning the light off using a switch), everything reverted back to default settings. Audio was "tinny" sounding. Overall, disappointing based on the initial description.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We got two. One is in the bathroom for jamming out while you take a shower! The regular light could be a bit brighter. Color changing is fun. When it goes to the music is cool except for being off in between notes. The 2nd bulb we put on the back porch. We can listen to music out there and chill after a long day. I think it'd be great for parties. The sound is actually really good! Never expected that out of a light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. I have two of them now and got one for my mom for mothers day. Works great, huge variety of colors and the speaker has good sound. I wish there was an option to turn the speaker off though. I live in an apartment and my neighbors have accidently linked to this speaker on several occasions and scared me half to death.
customer_reviews.author: Quinlyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good option  for autism
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who suffers autism. He can listen to some nice Bach music at his room with and we can change the light color. He use to break all the other stuff to listen music, but this one is on the ceiling. He loves music. I recommended already this light bulb-speaker to all the people with this kind of issues and now, I recommend this to you.
customer_reviews.author: Luis F. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: BUY BUY BUY THESE SPEAKERS!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the total Party Package. Hook up with my phone bloototh speaker makes you dance with its flashing lights and colors! I had to buy one for my friends and family. And when you dont want it flashing the speaker can play still the music and have a normsl white lighz on. Its awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: ION STORES

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Nice! This is cool! I installed this in the light fixture above the bathtub for when my wife takes baths....because I'm a man and I don't take baths, of course. The speaker is not bad at all for the price! I listened to rock music and a few rap songs and the sound was great! This little angel halo of a lightbulb can get loud! Another nice feature is that you can dim the light or completely turn it off. Just found everybody's Christmas presents for Christmas 2018!
customer_reviews.author: Doc J Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Best tick Tok buy of 2020
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!!! Perfect addition to my room! Just tried on my vanity will move to ceiling light. Easy to install and when light turned off just stops. When turned back on it automatically turns on. Will buy more for other rooms in house. Love the colors & flash and strobe feature.
customer_reviews.author: JAJ

customer_reviews.title: They light has a 3 seconds delay when turning on
customer_reviews.text: The light takes about 3 seconds to turn on but we've it does it's pretty bright. The speaker is pretty great for its size and the lights can be set to flash with three music and it's pretty accurate. Overall not bad but that delay is quite long.
customer_reviews.author: TheBarracuda

customer_reviews.title: Everything works as expected but has two minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: The light works with no issue and the speaker is well what it is. Don’t expect it to be a high end quality it’s great for listening. To music while working around the house. Now the only flaws I noticed are when the song has too many beats the “flicker to music” option has issues as to where the lightbulb can’t keep up and doesn’t light up due to the constant switching. The other is that making the volume button the same as the “skip/next song” button seems to be counter productive. Skipping songs when wanting to adjust volume. Those are minor issues that do not take away from the overall functionality of the light and it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Lissette

customer_reviews.title: Fun and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun light for outside especially during the summer!! Bought it for a new house and can’t wait to try it there. We tested it out and seriously got it working in less than a minute...color changing is so fun and the sound quality is very impressive. Will definitely recommend to friends and keep buying in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far. I wish the colors were brighter in light like the white one is, but otherwise it's nice having the features of fade and strobe. Sound sounds really good in my small place. I am hearing-impaired and can understand most of it rather well. I do like the color changes when music plays as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tawny Fowler

customer_reviews.title: ... it quit and would not play anymore- sound was good for 20 minutes but very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Speaker worked for about twenty minutes before it quit and would not play anymore- sound was good for 20 minutes but very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Bait & switch
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these about a year ago and love it! Then we moved and I have a few more areas in this house that I needed music, so I returned to Amazon for another bulb. This newest bulb sucks! Not only is the sound quality drastically different- muted overall and the highs cause it to distort and the lows aren't as low as my previous bulb, but the bulb sometimes takes a very long time to turn on at all! Clearly they sold so well that someone decided to cheapen them down eventually and believe me it's noticable!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I didn’t have high hopes, but I was wrong! This works so well! The colors are bright! The speaker is SO loud, you can control everything from the remote and every button worked except the dimming one, but that doesn’t bother me too much, it works great and the packing was nice! They delivered it very fast and it came in two days without prime!! The colors are nice and they have a variety of pleasing colors, my favorite are the blues, purple and red! It first very well! And the color changing is also very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Adalia

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for myself in December 2017. I am very happy with the lights as well as the Bluetooth speaker. The speaker has exceptional sound quality and can be controlled via remote or your phone. Family and friends liked it so much I have purchased a couple for them as well. Some have ordered their own. Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the sound quality..
customer_reviews.text: was a little skeptical about the sound quality from a small watt speaker in a $15 product, but it is GREAT , the one bulb fills the whole room with sound and can be heard everywhere in my 1020sqft apt when turned all the way up.Love it love it !! Now if they would just make these to where you can sync your device to more than one bulb at a time .
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at both the sound fidelity and volume this speaker produces. I bought it for a bit of fun, but it's actually really functional. I love the way it doubles as a nightlight. If I had this remote control when I was a kid, I could have ambushed the monster in my closet. Let there be light!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Graham

customer_reviews.title: Very good speaker light!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use Alexa when I am in the shower. I have tried those waterproof bluetooth speakers, but they are a pain when you forget to charge them regularly. This is in my Vanity light bar and I can hear my briefings and music without having to move my dot in the bathroom or forget to recharge a speaker. The "follow the music" lights are not all cracked up to what they make out, but it is a great light on white.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever shipping was fast BUT the product is junk!! The speaker lasted 1 week and does not work anymore so all I have is a light bulb. Never again will I order this product!!! If I could have rated it 0 stars I would have but that was not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Fisher

customer_reviews.title: 2 weeks - it no longer works
customer_reviews.text: this product stopped working 2 weeks after purchase. I bought two different brands , and the sengled brand still works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Christina R.

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: The white light isnt good enough to really light a room. Best used in an accent lamp. Speaker is decent. In the middle of the night someone connected their bluetooth to it and I think I had a heart attack. Wish there were a way to turn off bluetooth when not using that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by this bulb. It is bright, the colors are fun, and the speakers isn't bad. The remote doesn't always work, you need to have the right angle, but that is easy to deal with. If you are looking for something different and fun, this is a great but.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright and Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: This is great as a white light bulb and mediocre in the color modes. It's really quite loud for what it is and I totally recommend trying one. I will say it's really flared on the bell end and wouldn't fit in my ceiling fan. It fit fine in a normal table top lamp. I liked it so much a bought another for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Warner

customer_reviews.title: Died in two months
customer_reviews.text: The Battery went day within one week & it's tricking to replace it. It is an old Blue Tooth technology so it will connect to Alexa via BT but volume control with the remote doesn't work. Changed to one star because it stopped working, both the speaker and remote. Stay away
customer_reviews.author: M Story

customer_reviews.title: Cool light
customer_reviews.text: The light bulb should fit in any universal socket because I checked it in two different lamps and it worked in both. The bulbs has different light seetings you can keep it on like a specific color and changing colors. The speakers are a nice touch which make the product different. The speaker volume itself is good for a bedroom but don’t really have much bass.
customer_reviews.author: Sharan Chohan

customer_reviews.title: My only regret...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after looking at several options and reading the positive reviews on Amazon. I am using the bulb to build a desk lamp for my son. My only regret is that I didn’t buy MORE of these bulbs SOONER! It was super easy to connect to my iPhone via Bluetooth, sound is better than I was expecting, and the remote is pretty self explanatory. I also like that you can use the remote to skip songs, pause the music, and you can listen to music without having the light on. For the price, I’m pretty sure I will be giving these as gifts for my friends and family members for the foreseeable future. What a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dan M.

customer_reviews.title: So Easy and Great sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this bluetooth light speaker - so easy to connect to my phone and use for mood lighting or if you just want to set the stage for a romantic interlude - great product. Would buy this again, so easy to install and set up I was able to do it myself!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install, just put it in and it’s ready to go! Love that it’s bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest things I’ve bought from amazon. The speaker can get super LOUD and I love all the different colors and that they can be control with a remote which really sold me. It could be brighter but I still love it and might get a second one for my other lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Brimedia

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, cool effects!  💯 Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** 2/23/19 The seller sent me a replacement bulb and remote. The Customer service provided was exceptional. Thank you Texsens!! The battery mount snapped when I removed it change the battery. Now the light is useless. The bulb itself is putting of a light hum/hissing noise as well. Nice while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: LarryFisherman

customer_reviews.title: Connection is horrible
customer_reviews.text: It is near impossible to connect this to anything. I had it connected to my phone, but it disconnects and then connected to my neighbor's TV. The light is nice, but the remote does not work well either. I guess you get what you pay though.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: SO FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are AWESOME! Originally got it for my bedroom lamp, and ended up buying a second one for our front porch. Going to be great for Halloween, fun colors and we can play spooky music at the same time! Pretty dang good sound also.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Finkbonner

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for a home!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool techie piece! I ordered 2, thinking I could play music out of both at the same time (hoping the reviews were wrong, and hence the 4-star rating). I have other LED flood lights in my apartment recessed lighting, but this seems to be a little dimmer than the others. But hey, it turns color in tune with the music and it's so cool! I put the other in my bathroom so I can listen to music in the shower. The only things I would suggest are making it able to sync with other bulbs, and making it brighter. Other than that, it's a cool product so far, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our kitchen as we love to listen to music while we cook, but hate having a speaker taking up space on the counter. Light is bright, and the kids get a kick out of the color change functions. I've seen some reviews in reference to sound and distortion, and one thing that will make a difference is to adjust the volume on the speaker itself rather than the device you're listening to. If you try to push the stronger signal through the speaker from the device, it will clip, and you'll blow it out. Hope that helps!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Sounds horrible after a month, light functions stopped working also
customer_reviews.author: jose castruita

customer_reviews.title: Sadly didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less tha a month out on the covered back porch. It does say not to use in damp areas, however in the South with the humidity it’s always “damp”. Was great while it lasted and if the make a damp proof one I’m first in line to buy...
customer_reviews.author: M. Metts

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: This light is awesome it lights up in my room really well it has awesome colors and different features. It also you can set it to music and it'll play the lights to the music which is fun. And you can turn it off and on really easily from the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Fry

customer_reviews.title: Dead remote
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality coming from the bulb is great! Impressive for a light bulb. However I was sent one with a remote that does not work.. so I cannot change the color of the bulb. At first I thought it was just the battery.. so I changed the battery and still nothing. Super bummed considering I purchased this for the colored lights.
customer_reviews.author: Allisah

customer_reviews.title: Great concept- terrible speaker, worst sm
customer_reviews.text: Get a regular LED light bulb and a separate Bluetooth speaker. The speaker is so low quality that it will make you want to turn it off rather than listen to the butchered renderance of the music. Great concept.
customer_reviews.author: Lilbigdogblake

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: love it and more. worth every penny. the sound is better than expected out of the small speaker. love the lights and different colors. There is no app for your phone. you change the colors with the remote. You also have the option to turn the light off and use it just as a speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa User

customer_reviews.title: Remote is trash
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty decent speaker but not so much lightbulb if you plan on using it as your normal bulb. More for special occasions but the remote broke not even a month after me having it. Only the white, fade, strobe and flash work so basically the ones on the right side of the remote and it didn’t really bother me until recently because I tried to use it as a nightlight for my baby but it’s kind of hard to sleep with lights strobing around everywhere. If you’re looking for something you’ll have control over invest in something a little better made.
customer_reviews.author: Kisha

customer_reviews.title: Great for Newborns bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, easy setup . We use it for our newborns bedroom to play white noise. Sounds is clear with no issues with bluetooth connectivity. Great when changing diapers in the middle of the night ! Were able to turn on the yellow light to keep it dim but bright enough for us to change babys diaper and put her back down.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T.

customer_reviews.title: Fun bulb
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bulb; still going strong after awhile. However the speaker stopped working after like a month, sound quality wasn’t great but it got pretty loud. For its price I probably will buy again if/when mine burns out.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bluetooth lightbulb! The speaker sounds perfectly clear and the coloring changing effects make this lots of fun! This lightbulb is quite bright even when using it as a regular lightbulb. Will probably buy a few more to use in various rooms of my house. Great gift idea for a teenager :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's boy friend. He fell in love it with it. My daughter tried it out before giving it to him and didn't want him to have it lol. She will end up asking me to buy her one.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised one time
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth speaker worked great....once. Remote control was glitchy right out of the box. Light works fine, but I wish it was brighter. Pretty much overpaid for a normal lightbulb.
customer_reviews.author: StLPup

customer_reviews.title: Distorted sound quality
customer_reviews.text: There's no linking of multiple light bulbs. And the bass is really subpar. The sound has a lot of distortion. The lighting is great and responds to music like a poor man's windows media viewer visualization. If it ran on windows 98 that's 16 bit and 32 bit os you would expect a little more. But is still a good parlor trick affect.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play, fast and easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: Great light! It installed and started up fast. It was a quick install and play no issues at all. Sounds great and my boys really enjoy playing music in their room while they play. Will be installing these throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: Rangelita

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use just screw it in and it turn on and the controller is easy it bright but not for a whole big room but the music sounds loud and the music sync button is cool not the most amazing sound quality but super worth it for a lamp or something I might get another one
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but it took a dive..
customer_reviews.text: Has surprisingly decent sound. But after a hour of use, the color changing ability stopped working. Was a Birthday for my daughters room. So yeah, went from being a cool thing to a typical white light with sound...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carey

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool product!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing item. Not only is the sound quality amazing but it can be hear pretty far away. The color changing options are a lot of fun. Especially at night time. It fits just about anywhere, unless there is a fixture in the outlet. I love that it has a remote control! It connected via Bluetooth very easily.
customer_reviews.author: HappyFamilyofThree

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for me
customer_reviews.text: This dull 40 watt equivalent bulb was too dull and bulky to be useful. It would not fit as a lamp bulb because it hit the state's harp and when screwed into the ceiling's recessed lighting fixture, it protruded out and was tight against the Dan's inner walls.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGuru

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Brighter then I thought and much louder then I thought. Perfect for my needs needs. Perfect for a party or to play some nice sleeping music. Placed it in my bedroom with another color changing light. Paired together they are very nice
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Get one!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is loud and clear. I am going to order another one. This is a great gift for anyone. My boys love to play music in the bathroom so I got this for them. No more trying to hear your phone over the shower water.
customer_reviews.author: Korinne T Cheeks

customer_reviews.title: Great LED bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: We love these Blue tooth bulbs. We have 1 in each bathroom for 3 yrs. and put1 in our kitchen/den recently. We listen to music and podcasts. I will buy another one when one wears out. Easy to use and the remote is simple. You can brighten or dim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked one day and done.
customer_reviews.text: If I were to rate this last night it would have 5 stars. Today, not so much. Yesterday, when I received the item, it was working perfectly and exactly as described. Today however, I cannot get the Bluetooth to connect, or the remote to work. It just turns on and stays white. The on/off buttons do not even work. I had everything working perfectly last night and I absolutely loved this item. Sadly, that is not the case today. Edit: they have contacted me and said they will send a replacement. I will update review when I receive the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Senceria Santiago

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old nephew loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew birthday and was little skeptical if he would like it due to him being 6. But he loves it, him and his cousin have a light show while listening to rock and they think its the coolest thing.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed only got it once
customer_reviews.text: Does not respond all the time to the remote control you have to play with it before you send it to work it makes the outlet vibrate so it sounds like rattling metal disappointed Please refund or send one that works please!!️
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Good light, Bad remote.
customer_reviews.text: 4/5 Sound is a lot better than I expected for the price. Remote doesn't work, so I've not been able to enjoy the color features. It worked once when I removed the tab for the battery, and only once. If the remote worked, I'd have gone with 5 stars. Hopefully a battery change will resolve this, but it seems in the reviews the remote is a common issue.
customer_reviews.author: GMC Reader

product_meta.title: Texsens LED Light Bulb Bluetooth Speaker, 6W E26 RGB Changing Lamp Wireless Stereo Audio with 24 Keys Remote Control
product_meta.description:
NOTE: Please don't install it in humid place.

Features:
100% Brand New and High Quality. 
Multi colors, Bluetooth control, Music functions. 
With remote control(NO need APP), can be manually adjust the light color. 
Optional also choose RGB mode, the light randomly beating. 
Energy saving, environmental protection, low power, low heat generating. 
Easy to install and operate. 

Specification:
The two section switch: Switching between the white and colored light
Item type: led music bulb
Color of body: White
Light color: RGBW
Material: Plastic
Voltage: AC100-240V/50Hz-60Hz
Total power: 12W
Output power: 6W
Speaker power: 3W
Frequency response: 135Hz-15KHz
Base: E26
Bluetooth version: 3.0 and Bluetooth Smart
Support configuration: A2DP
Luminous: 400 Lm
Temperature: 5700-6300K
Life span: 10000 hours
Radio range: 10m/33ft
Weight: 250g
Dimensions: 5.19 in x 3.7 in x 3.7 in (13.2cm x 9.4cm x 9.4cm) 
Remote Controller power supplied by: 1 * button cell battery
Application:
Suitable for the bedroom, closet, cabinet, corridor, workshop, basement, garage, stairwell, oil depots, roof, door and other places. 

Package Include:
1 X 6W Bluetooth speaker LED bulb
1 X User manual
1 X IR Remote controller (Battery is included) 

NOTE: PLEASE DON'T INSTALL THE BULBS IN HUMID ENVIRONMENT!
feature_bullets: This bulb is a Bluetooth enabled, multicolored, energy efficient smart LED light
Adjustable volume of light and music, comparable to a 50 Watts Halogen bulb
Energy saving and good quality support music, with Bluetooth 3.0
One Remote controller can control multi bulbs(the light).but one bulb can only be connected to one Bluetooth device(output sound)
Suitable for the bedroom, closet, cabinet, Corridor, workshop, basement, garage, stairwell, oil depots, roof, door and other places

specifications.Item model number: LED Light Bulb Bluetooth Speaker, 6W E26
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,186 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
